channel.title: CISA KEV Rss Feed
channel.description: An alternate way to get your KEV Data

item.title: Accellion FTA Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) Vulnerability
item.description: Accellion FTA contains a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exploited via a crafted POST request to wmProgressstat.html.
item.content:encoded: Accellion FTA contains a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exploited via a crafted POST request to wmProgressstat.html.

item.title: Accellion FTA SQL Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Accellion FTA contains a SQL injection vulnerability exploited via a crafted host header in a request to document_root.html.
item.content:encoded: Accellion FTA contains a SQL injection vulnerability exploited via a crafted host header in a request to document_root.html.

item.title: Accellion FTA OS Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Accellion FTA contains an OS command injection vulnerability exploited via a local web service call.
item.content:encoded: Accellion FTA contains an OS command injection vulnerability exploited via a local web service call.

item.title: Accellion FTA OS Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Accellion FTA contains an OS command injection vulnerability exploited via a crafted POST request to various admin endpoints.
item.content:encoded: Accellion FTA contains an OS command injection vulnerability exploited via a crafted POST request to various admin endpoints.
